title: Hallowe'en
description: Story of a British subject who returns to his home in rural northern England after earning his fortune in London, bringing with him a wife who becomes the focus of a family struggling for its identity in changing times. Generally regarded as a takeoff on the successful "Rebecca" by Daphne DuMaurier (1938) which later was adapted for the feature length film, "My Cousin Rachel."
author: Leslie Burgess
